response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, and I believe it presents an excellent investment opportunity for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms of the sale. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
